results.content: I would have given this course 5 stars had I not gotten stuck on several instances of PHP not working, later discovering after watching the videos over again and again thinking I had messed up, that the issue was due to the code used in the video no longer being valid. After googling to find the current PHP code arguments/syntax, I was able to accomplish the same result as the videos.
results.content_html: I would have given this course 5 stars had I not gotten stuck on several instances of PHP not working, later discovering after watching the videos over again and again thinking I had messed up, that the issue was due to the code used in the video no longer being valid.
